dcterms:creator: A. Zirikly

A. Uzuner
K. Hollingshead
dcterms:description: The University of Maryland Reddit Suicidality Dataset was developed using data from Reddit to identify suicidality risk of posts. It contains post ID, anonymous user ID, timestamp, subreddit name, post title, and post body, with training data containing four labels denoted by a to d, representing increasing risk of suicidality.
dcterms:title: University of Maryland Reddit Suicidality Dataset
